markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Salamander](/Monsters.aspx?ID=189)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Salamanders have serpentine lower torsos, but humanoid upper bodies with toothy reptilian snouts. Their affinity for cruelty and violence puts them in close alliance with the demons of the Abyss.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Salamander](/Monsters.aspx?ID=189)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 148</row>

**Perception** +15; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 ranseur_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 125

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Weaknesses**
cold 10

**Attack of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_ranseur_ +18 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire and Grab

**Armor of Flames** <actions string="Single Action" />  The salamander stokes its internal flames. Until the start of its next turn, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, and when an adjacent creature touches it or hits it with a physical attack, that creature takes 2d6 persistent fire damage unless it succeeds at a DC 25 Reflex save.

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d8+4 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire, DC 25

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-43" />
name: Salamander
